column4: will aptitude detect dependencies that were install with apt-get?

better yet... I want to do some upgrades on a web server, but need to *freeze* some packages and their dependencies (ruby, rubyonrails, etc)... will 'aptitude hole ruby' do this for me (even if I installed using 'apt-get install ruby'
you should avoid to mix apt-get and aptitude. it's always better to use just one of those front-ends
